meaningMnemonic: A <radical>gladiator</radical> only sees himself (<radical>oneself</radical>) on those big <kanji>scroll</kanji>s they advertise the fights with. Gladiators don't get mirrors and there are no cameras or videos yet. The scroll drawings are all they get of themselves.
readingMnemonic: When you look at the <kanji>scroll</kanji> you realize... you look just like Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん)! You excitedly fist pump and start showing everyone how cool you are.
